characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a white van, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wet road in rainy conditions. The visibility is low due to fog. The self-driving vehicle is following a black sedan and a white van. A motorcyclist is seen on the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while following the black sedan and white van. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the vehicles ahead, considering the wet road conditions.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Front: A white van, approximately 15 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 3) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 20 meters away, riding steadily.
